name: FloatGrids VR Design System
description:
What is FloatGrids?

FloatGrids is a VR design system which intends to give UX and UI designers a tool to create, prototype and test digital products for the Metaverse. It comes along with a Unity package so that you could send it over to your engineers and be well aligned in terms of consistency and scalability.


FloatGrids is also a starting point of a bigger project where everybody is welcome to participate and add improvements.


See it in action in this video ▶️


🧰

Unity Package

While we are working on getting FloatGrids published in Unity, you still can get the package by DM me on Linkedin @albertmauri


📦

What will you find in the file?

  • Set of components using Variants
  • Guidelines to design UI experiences in VR
  • VR UI examples
